summary: AN ORDINANCE reorganizing the City Planning Commission; providing for its membership; redefining its functions; authorizing its staff; amending Sections 11.1, 16.3, 16.5, 17.22, 24.44, 24.46, 24.72, 24.83, 27.2, 27.41, 27.6, 27.7 and 28.2 of Ordinance 86300 (the Zoning Ordinance); Sections 2 and 7 of Ordinance 98852, and Sections 13.08, 18.19, and 22 of Ordinance 105636 (the Subdivision Ordinance); transferring support positions to the Office of the Planning Commission; and repealing Sections 27.4 and 24.45 of Ordinance 86300; Section 3.04, 20 and 21 of Ord. 105636; and Ord. 99443 and 106302.
